title: Fan extravaganza in Qatar as Argentina win 2022 World Cup
description: Argentina fans ecstatic after victory in dramatic final, while France supporters rue loss in penalty shootout.

title: Twitter bans ‘free promotion’ of other social media platforms
description: Social media giant says it will remove content linking to accounts on Facebook, Instagram, Mastodon and others.

title: Low turnout a message from Tunisian people to Saied: ‘Step aside’
description: Opposition parties say the only way forward for Tunisia is to get out of President Kais Saied’s system of one-man rule.

title: Tears of relief and joy as Messi lifts World Cup for Argentina
description: Waves of euphoria sweep through Argentina fans after dramatic victory over France makes them champions for a third time.

title: What does Japan’s military expansion mean for the region?
description: Tokyo announces its biggest military build-up since World War II.

title: Messi says he will not retire from Argentinian national team
description: After lifting the World Cup, the 35-year-old star says he will continue playing in an Argentina shirt for a while yet.

title: France fans hail Mbappe’s dazzling World Cup final performance
description: Mbappe secured the golden boot with his hat-trick in the final and came close to winning a second World Cup.

title: US says it ‘looks forward’ to working with new Peru president
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken called on political actors in Peru to ease tensions and pursue 'reconciliation'.

title: Photos: Messi and Argentina lift World Cup after win over France
description: After an incredible match that went into penalty kicks, the Argentinians claimed football's biggest prize.

title: Kylian Mbappe wins World Cup Golden Boot award, beating Messi
description: Mbappe scored eight goals, including three against Argentina on Sunday in an exhilarating final at Lusail Stadium.

description: Argentina's third World Cup win caps Lionel Messi's unbelievable career.

title: Messi’s Argentina beat France on penalties to win World Cup
description: Lionel Messi's Argentina overcome France in rollercoaster showpiece event concluded by Gonzalo Montiel's spot-kick.

title: Teenager charged after refugee boat capsizes in English Channel
description: The 19-year-old was charged with abetting illegal immigration after four people died while trying to cross the Channel.

title: Qatar holds spectacular World Cup closing ceremony ahead of final
description: Light, art, poetry, music and fireworks - Qatar puts on a classic World Cup closing ceremony.

title: World Cup finals boost National Day celebrations in Qatar
description: This December 18 marks Qatar's National Day and the final match between Argentina and France in the FIFA World Cup.

title: World Cup finals boost National Day celebrations in Qatar
description: This December 18 marks Qatar's National Day and the final match between Argentina and France in the FIFA World Cup.

title: The trouble with Edward Snowden
description: The whistleblower has readily spoken up on many things, except on Putin's war.

title: Türkiye emerges as a leader of the zero-waste movement
description: The country's leadership has inspired progress on achieving zero waste at home and abroad.

title: At least 12 killed in accident in Afghanistan’s Salang Tunnel
description: The government said 37 people were injured after a fuel tanker caught fire, and the death toll was expected to rise.

title: ‘Maradona is guiding us’: Argentina fans ahead of World Cup final
description: Argentina fans are seeking inspiration from the late Diego Maradona as they hope their team can repeat his 1986 magic.

description: Authorities have charged four people, including a European Parliament vice president, over alleged influence campaign.

title: World Cup 2022: The Scorecard
description: “I’ve been blown away by the atmosphere.”

title: ‘Preventive conservation’ at Venetian palace
description: Art restorers intervene on precious artworks and elaborate ornamentation at the Doge's Palace in Venice.

title: Liberians protest living costs as Weah returns from 48-day trip
description: Analysts warn of more protests ahead of the 2023 elections despite President Weah's popularity in parts of Liberia.

title: ‘Republic of fear’: A return to Yemen after 11 years
description: In April, a nationwide truce provided a much-awaited opening for a return home.

title: EU reaches agreement on pivotal carbon market deal
description: Negotiators were at odds over how quickly to end free CO2 permits the EU gives industries.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 298
description: As the Russia-Ukraine war enters its 298th day, we take a look at the main developments.

title: ‘We’re going to win’: Argentina waits in hope for World Cup title
description: A nation battered by crises is coming together to cheer for Argentina as they face France in Sunday's World Cup final.

description: France can win the World Cup even if Mbappe is kept quiet. Argentina have no hope of winning if Messi doesn’t turn up.

title: Kenya: Music, activism and ending police violence
description: Disillusioned by electoral politics, an activist and a musician mobilise against police killings and government neglect.

title: At least eight police killed in blast near Iraq’s Kirkuk
description: Those killed near the north-central city were police officers, security sources told Reuters.

title: Palestinian-French rights lawyer Hammouri deported by Israel
description: Hammouri had been held in Israeli administrative detention based on 'secret evidence' without charges since March.

title: From president on down, France revels before World Cup final
description: 'I’m backing the France team, and I think that the French are too,' President Emmanuel Macron said.

title: World Cup: For Lionel Messi and Argentina, now is all
description: The script says Messi will be the conductor of football's great show and lift the trophy at the end of it. Will he?

description: Barahat Al Janoub was renamed 'Barwargento' by Argentinian supporters who have brought a touch of their home to Qatar.

title: Messi calligraphy sketches a big hit among Qatar World Cup fans

title: Election deadlock in Fiji after all votes counted: Vote monitor

title: North Korea fires ballistic missiles towards sea off east coast
description: Launch comes three days after North Korea said it tested a 'high-thrust solid-fuel motor' engine for ballistic missiles.

title: Freak wave kills three swimmers, injures 17 at South Africa beach
description: Official says at least 17 people were hospitalised and in critical condition following a huge wave at Durban beach.

title: Grenade launcher gifted by Ukraine wounds Polish police chief
description: Polish police chief says the explosion that wounded him last week was caused by grenade launcher – a gift from Ukraine.

title: World Cup 2022 closing ceremony set to be ‘A Night To Remember’
description: Almost 90,000 are expected to attend Sunday’s closing ceremony at Lusail Stadium followed by the France-Argentina match.

title: Bangladeshis, Argentina’s biggest fans, gear up for final
description: Millions in the South Asian country support Argentina, which will take on France in Sunday's championship game in Qatar.
